video.name: BAKED VIETNAMESE FRIES | Vegan Richa Recipes
video.description:
Vietnamese inspired Fries . Baked 
Get the WRITTEN RECIPE here - https://www.veganricha.com/baked-vietnamese-fries/

SUBSCRIBE HERE: https://www.youtube.com/veganricharecipes?sub_confirmation=1

Baked Potato strips, loads of cilantro and basil, bean sprouts, nuts in sweet chile sauce, sriracha and vegan mayo! Banh mi Sandwich in fries form.

These Vietnamese inspired fries are topped with fresh cilantro, basil, scallions, bean sprouts, sweet-spicy sauce, some cashew cream and toasty nuts. Use russet potatoes to make regular fries or sweet potatoes for Sweet potato fries. 

******MORE FRIES AND SNACK RECIPES FROM THE BLOG******

BAKED SWEET POTATO FRIES WITH CHIPOTLE RANCH: https://www.veganricha.com/baked-sweet-potato-fries-with-chipotle-ranch/

BAKED FRIES WITH GARLIC SAUCE: https://www.veganricha.com/baked-fries-with-garlic-sauce/

BAKED MANGO SRIRACHA CAULIFLOWER WINGS: https://www.veganricha.com/baked-mango-sriracha-cauliflower-wings/

COOKBOOKS BY RICHA HINGLE (VEGAN RICHA): https://www.veganricha.com/mybooks/

#bakedfries #vietnamesefries #vietnameserecipe #veganricha #easyveganrecipes

recipeIngredient: 1  large russet potato (chopped into matchsticks and baked with salt and pepper (or use sweet potato))
1/3 cup or more Roasted chopped peanuts or cashews pieces
Vegan mayo (thinned with water if needed or cashew cream (add salt, sugar, lemon juice to taste))
2 tbsp sambal oelek or asian chile sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Bake the fries according to these instructions. Use Baked Sweet Potato Fries for Baked Russet Potato Fries
recipeInstructions.name: Bake the fries according to these instructions. Use Baked Sweet Potato Fries for Baked Russet Potato Fries

recipeInstructions.text: Roast the nuts on a pan over medium low heat until golden (if using unroasted).
recipeInstructions.name: Roast the nuts on a pan over medium low heat until golden (if using unroasted).

recipeInstructions.text: Mix all the ingredients under sweet chili sauce and bring to boil to thicken.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix all the ingredients under sweet chili sauce and bring to boil to thicken.

recipeInstructions.text: Reserve 1 tbsp of nuts for garnish, and mix the rest with half the sauce.
recipeInstructions.name: Reserve 1 tbsp of nuts for garnish, and mix the rest with half the sauce.

recipeInstructions.text: Arrange the fries on a platter. Sprinkle salt, pepper to taste. Layer cilantro and basil.
recipeInstructions.name: Arrange the fries on a platter. Sprinkle salt, pepper to taste. Layer cilantro and basil.

recipeInstructions.text: Add a layer of bean sprouts. Add the sauced roasted nuts.
recipeInstructions.name: Add a layer of bean sprouts. Add the sauced roasted nuts.

recipeInstructions.text: Drizzle sriracha, vegan mayo and more of the sweet chili sauce. Add chopped scallions, reserved nuts and more cilantro. Serve warm.
recipeInstructions.name: Drizzle sriracha, vegan mayo and more of the sweet chili sauce. Add chopped scallions, reserved nuts and more cilantro. Serve warm.
